snippet.title: Kairos management changes
snippet.content: Kairos Minerals MD Joshua Wellisch has resigned in order to pursue other business interests. He will assist the company during a management transition period over the next few months. Terry Topping, who joined Kairos as an executive director in March, will assume the role of executive chairman and CEO. Mining executive Bruno Seneque has also been appointed to the board as a non-executive director. Originally published as
